main event: A UFO was observed descending in a gliding fashion, reflecting light, and eventually disappearing from view after a 40-minute sighting.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for 40 minutes, descending at varying rates and reflecting light.
The report indicates that there were photographs taken of the UFO.
The sighting occurred at 0915-1024 local time.
The observer noticed a very bright light above and the object descends in a gliding path as if to land.
The reporting officer's opinion suggests the observer might have noticed a natural phenomenon or a light civilian aircraft in the area.
sighted object: reflective object descending in a gliding fashion
